channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OpenShift Login Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OpenShift Login Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-37946|2023-10-24T12:50:48.798Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openshift%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenShift Login Plugin 1.1.0.227.v27e08dfb_1a_20 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-37947|2023-10-24T12:50:49.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openshift%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenShift Login Plugin 1.1.0.227.v27e08dfb_1a_20 and earlier improperly determines that a redirect URL after login is legitimately pointing to Jenkins, allowing attackers to perform phishing attacks.
